title: Incarcerator

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Patrol at someoneâ€™s house at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- While patrolling someone's house, you will detain all visitors except for the Jailor and another Incarcerator.

- You will know if you detained someone, but they will not know that they were detained.

- You will not learn the names or roles of people you detain.

- Detained targets will be roleblocked the night after you detain them.

- If you are roleblocking your detained targets, you will not be able to patrol at someone's house.

- If you are roleblocking your detained targets, you will gain control and roleblock immunity.

desc:
Post 370
*No I am not Discount Jailor.*
Temporary control immunity
Temporary roleblock immunity
